ygData.subject: Suckage
ygData.msgSnippet: I was in E Freeport with my dark elf. I really worked on my faction so that everyone conned at least dubious to me. I went into Seafarer s roost and made sure
ygData.messageBody:
I was in E Freeport with my dark elf. I really worked on my faction so that
everyone conned at least dubious to me. I went into Seafarer's roost and
made sure to con everyone. Nobody was KOS. Most were apprehensive to
indifferent. I went to buy from a merchant. As soon as I finished the
transaction something started hitting me. I turned around and couldnt' see
it anywhere. I ran from the building and soon I was dead. Even looking down
at my corpse, whatever attacked me was not visible. I scrolled back up to
see what I had done to piss it off. All the thing said before attacking me
was "How dare you!" It didn't say anything about me being a dark elf or
whatnot. I petitioned and the GM said that it probably attacked me thru the
wall and promised to get back to me later after she looked into it. She
never did. :-(
The worst part was, I lost my level.. and I still haven't gotten back after
a week. I lost 3 blue bubbles of xp. :-(
What do you folks think? Should I repetion?
luv,
-Su
